### Problem 1  

```{r}
# Function takes the vector as input
f1 <- function(x=NULL){
  if(is.null(x)){
    return("Null input")
  }

  f11 <- function(y){
    1/exp(y^2)
  }
  sapply(x, f11)
}

# function call
x <- c(0, 1, 100)
f1(x)
```
